categoryBlurb: The time has come. Your son or daughter or favorite niece is moving on to the next phase of their life - and a truly meaningful gift is in order. At GiftStarter, we know that it can be a challenge to find that perfect gift - and we can help.  To make it easy, we have curated our favorite gift ideas for group gifting that will help your graduate open the next chapter feeling loved.  Itâ€™s time to rally friends & family to let them know how special their graduation achievement is to all.
categoryMetaDescription: Find the best ideas for a perfect high school, college, or grad school graduation  gift.    Our group gifting platform makes it easy to surprise the graduate with a memorable gift they really want.

productList.productName: Apple 128GB iPad Air 2 (Wi-Fi Only, Space Gray)
productList.productDescription: An Apple iPad Air 2 is the perfect graduation gift for any student- awesomely practical for taking notes, writing, web projects, digital imaging, and more.  Millenials are all about texting and social media on their smartphones, so buy your grad an iPad for easier web searching and amazing screen resolution. With a large display and up to 10 hours of battery life for games, googling and maybe even work, iPads make the perfect graduation gift.
productList.productMetaDescription: An Apple iPad Air 2 is the perfect graduation group gift for any student - awesomely practical for taking notes, writing, web projects, digital imaging, and more.

productList.productDescription:
An Apple MacBook Air computer is the perfect graduation gift for any student - awesomely practical. A laptop is an expensive but very practical graduation gift for any student. They will need a computer to take notes, write papers, work assignments, job searching, programming, designing, and entertainment.


PRODUCT HIGHLIGHTS



  • 1.6 GHz Intel Core i5 (Broadwell)

  • 4GB of 1600 MHz LPDDR3 RAM

  • 256GB PCIe-Based Flash Storage

  • Integrated Intel HD Graphics 6000

  • 13.3" LED-Backlit Glossy Display

  • 1440 x 900 Native Resolution

  • 802.11ac Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 4.0

  • USB 3.0, Thunderbolt 2

  • 720p FaceTime HD Camera, SDXC Card Slot

  • Mac OS X 10.10 Yosemite
productList.productMetaDescription: An Apple MacBook Air computer is the perfect graduation group gift for any student - awesomely practical for taking notes, writing, web projects, digital imaging, and more.

productList.productName: Vilano Performance 700C-21 Speed Shimano Hybrid Flat Bar Commuter Road Bike (50cm)
productList.productDescription: For a graduate going to college or starting a chapter in life with a new job, this is one of the most useful and perfect gifts.  Behind the laptop computer, one of the most used items for a college freshman may be a bicycle. Biking on a college campus is a great way for students to be outdoors, exercise, and get to class quickly. And for a freshman without a car, owning a bike can be crucial for off-campus trips to grocery stores and parks.
productList.productMetaDescription: For a graduate going to college or starting a chapter in life with a new job, this is one of the most useful and perfect gifts.  Exercise, transportation, and running errands, this is a great gift.

productList.productName: Monster® Inspiration Active Noise Canceling Over-Ear Headphones -Titanium
productList.productDescription: Does your grad loves listening to music? Give him or her the gift of Monster Inspiration active noise cancelling over-ear headphones for listening to music with no distractions. With comfortable ear cushions and interchangeable headbands, these headphones deliver incredible, high-quality sound, no matter what else is going on around you. Ideal for jamming on the way to work or class.
productList.productMetaDescription: A great group gift for the new graduate who loves to take a break with music or even finds productivity with good music. Full of usefulness with all of the features it has.

productList.productDescription: A great gift for the new graduate.  As exciting as it is for high school grads to move on campus and start their new lives, there's nothing like packing up and coming home, even if it's just for a long weekend. A small suitcase can come in handy for weekend trips back home, studying abroad or spring break.  The Exo Hardshell fits the bill so they have an easy way to pack it all up and come home for a visit.
productList.productMetaDescription: A great group gift for the new graduate.  Useful for packing to visit home for a long weekend, studying abroad or spring break.  Practical and sturdy design to last for a long time.

productList.productName: Jawbone BIG JAMBOX Wireless Bluetooth Speaker - Graphite Hex
productList.productDescription: A great gift for the new graduate who loves to take a break with music or even finds productivity with good music. Maybe your grad wants to share all her music with roomies in the dorms, or just blast some tunes for an impromptu dance party. The Jawbone BIG JAMBOX bluetooth speaker for wireless connectivity, amazing sound quality and nealry 10 hours of battery life for nonstop fun — or calls home to Mom and Dad.
productList.productMetaDescription: A great group gift for the new graduate who loves to take a break with music or even finds productivity with good music. Full of usefulness with all of the features it has.

productList.productName: GoPro HERO3 White Edition Action Camera
productList.productDescription: For those grads who love to get out there and experience everything, a GoPro HERO3 camera is the ultimate in cool graduation gifts. The White Edition is both smaller and lighter than other GoPro models, and captures amazing, professional-quality video. Its's wearable, gear-mountable and waterproof for the ultimate in action shots, no matter what your grad has going on.
productList.productMetaDescription: A great group gift for the new graduate who loves adventure, digital photography or videography, and film making - useful features for great footage and capturing memories.

productList.productDescription: A great gift - Is your grad heading off to college or their first apartment? Help them stay organized with a steel dorm trunk to help stay on top of clutter in a small dorm room. Not only does this college trunk look cool, they give your grad extra storage space — or even a makeshift dinner table.
productList.productMetaDescription: A great group gift for the new graduate who is headed off to college or their first apartment.  Useful to give your graduate extra storage - or a makeshift dinner table.

productList.productDescription: This fridge is the perfect gift for a new graduate and will set up them up with plenty of space for snacks and drinks in the 3.3 cu. ft. storage capacity compact refrigerator.  Adjustable shelves, simple controls, and even a small freezer space.  A must have for any recent graduate about to set up home in a new dorm room or the first studio apartment.
productList.productMetaDescription: A great group gift for the new graduate who is headed off to college or their first apartment.  Useful to give your graduate extra storage - or a makeshift dinner table.

productList.productName: HP LaserJet Pro 200 M276nw Wireless Color All-in-One Laser Printer
productList.productDescription:
A great gift for a new graduate who already has the first job lined up or will be on the job hunt, this HP LaserJet Pro All-in-One Laser Printer will be a life saver and productivity enabler for all of life’s needs in the real world.  The LaserJet Pro 200 M276nw Wireless Color All-in-One Laser Printer from HP prints up to 14 pages per minute in black and color with a first page out time of 19 seconds in color and 18.5 seconds in black. In addition to USB connectivity, the M276nw includes Ethernet and wireless network connectivity for sharing the printer with other computers on your network. The printer is also compatible with AirPrint and ePrint which lets you print by simply emailing a file to your printer.


The printer's 35-sheet ADF lets you scan, fax, and copy multi-page documents in 1 easy step. The copier can output up to 99 copies and resize them anywhere from 25 to 400% of the original size. Additionally, you can adjust the copy density, copy 2 or 4 pages onto a single side, and copy a 2-sided ID onto 1 page. Scanning options include scan to USB drive, scan to a network folder, scan to PDF (including searchable) and scan to a cloud service such as Evernote or Dropbox.


Use the M276nw's built-in fax modem to send and receive faxes or send a fax right from your computer. Additionally, the printer supports fax forwarding, auto-redial, delayed sending, and can store up to 120 numbers in its built-in speed dial.
productList.productMetaDescription: A great group gift for the new graduate who already has the first job lined up or is on the job hunt, this all-in-one printer is a life saver and productivity enabler for all of lifeâ€™s needs.

productList.productName: Beats by Dr. Dre Pill XL Portable Speaker (Black)
productList.productNameShort: Beats by Dr. Dre Pill XL
productList.productDescription: A great gift for the new graduate who loves to take a break with music or even finds useful productivity with good music. The black Beats by Dr. Dre Pill XL Portable Speaker delivers room-filling sound with punching bass and pristine highs - all from a compact, portable capsule-shaped speaker. The wireless speaker supports Bluetooth connectivity and one-touch NFC pairing with compatible smartphones or other Bluetooth and NFC-enabled devices. Plus, you can use your Bluetooth-enabled phone or computer to change tracks. The Pill XL also features an auxiliary audio line input for connecting alternate MP3 players, tablets, CD players, computers, etc. There's a line-out jack as well. Other features include a visible fuel gauge, an automatic shut off function, and a charge output jack for charging your mobile device using the speaker's battery power.
productList.productMetaDescription: A great group gift for the new graduate who loves to take a break with music or even finds productivity with good music. Full of usefulness with all of the features it has.
productList.imageAltText: Beats by Dr. Dre Pill XL

productList.productDescription:
A great gift for the new graduate who loves adventure, digital photography or videography, and film making - useful features for great footage and capturing memories.  With a built-in touch screen LCD for composing shots and accessing the menu, the GoPro HERO4 Silver eliminates the need for an LCD BacPac. It is able to capture Full HD 1080p at up to 60 fps and - for even more detailed shots - capture 2.7K (2704 x 1520) at 30 fps and 4K (3840 x 2160) at 15 fps. There are a number of other frame rates and resolutions as well, including a 100 fps mode ideal for creating slow motion effects that is available in 960p and 720p. But the HERO Silver's capabilities don't stop with video. It can also take 12-megapixel stills, as individual shots, in intervals for stitching together time-lapse movies, or in momentary bursts of up to 30 photos per second - the latter helping ensure you catch fast action at just the right moment.


 


For remote monitoring and operation, the camera is equipped with Wi-Fi and Bluetooth connectivity, letting you pair it with a mobile device or the separately available Smart Remote. There is also a USB port for file transfer, charging, or to connect the optional 3.5mm mic adapter. In addition to the bundled flat and curved adhesive mounts, the camera is also adaptable to a wide range of separately available mounts from GoPro and third-parties - with options to accommodate just about any scenario imaginable.


 


Group gift it to capture and share those memories together.
productList.productMetaDescription: A great group gift for the new graduate who loves adventure, digital photography or videography, and film making - useful features for great footage and capturing memories.

productList.productDescription:
A great gift for the new graduate who loves a delicious beer and entertaining friends. This is a gift that enables sharing with family and friends - and gives for years to come.  Enjoy frosty, pub-style draft beer without sacrificing the comforts of home ever again. This delicious gadget frees up space in your fridge while allowing you to entertain family and friends in style.


 


Serve Heineken, Heineken Light or NewCastle Brown Ale with just the right amount of froth - and keep the beer fresh for up to 30 days.  The perfect gift for the beer connoisseur - he or she is going to love sharing this gift with family and friends.  Sharing is caring!
productList.productMetaDescription: A great group gift for the new graduate who loves frosty pub-style beer and entertaining friends. This is a gift that enables sharing with family and friends - and gives for years to come.

productList.productDescription:
Whether the new college graduate has got a job on the go or decides to take a year off to travel the world before they start a career, this is a gift that’ll help them stay connected with family and friends, with the most recent news, and the latest technology.  THe Yoga 3 Pro is powerful featuring a 4MB cache and 1.1GHz processor speed with Turbo Boost up to 2.6GHz and 8GB of memory.  Use it as a tablet with its high definition widescreen 10-point multitouch display (3200 x 1800 resolution).  And move over Apple the Lenova Yoga 3 also as a 256GB solid state drive with plenty of space.


Because sharing is caring, this is the perfect gift that also makes it easy to video chat with family and friends in 720p resolution.  It comes with Microsoft Windows 8.1 64-bit operating system and preinstalled plus extra software including Amazon Kindle Metro, Evernote Metro, Yoga Chef and more. Includes trial of Microsoft Office 2013.
productList.productMetaDescription: Great group gift for the new graduate whoâ€™s looking for a job or has a job on-the-go, or decides to take some time off to travel the world - help them stay connected to family and...

productList.productDescription:
This is the best gift for a new graduate, guaranteed.  Time to get a new suit or the first job interview!  Coming out of college demands a new suit.  Whether or not someone thinks they really need one, every one needs at least one suit - for the job interviews, the office party, a charity event, …  a fancy date.  The first suit usually comes from the Banana Republic.


Want to give this group gift a boost of fun?  Have everyone that pitches in on the gift write a note of advice to the recipient about life after graduation.  Remember, every pitch in also includes the opportunity to write a personal message, which are printed into a handmade card and delivered with the gift.
productList.productMetaDescription: The perfect group gift for a new graduate. Help them get work appropriate attire for a new job or their first job interview. A gift together can get the graduate off on the road to success!

productList.productDescription:
The ideal gift for the creative person in your life or the newly minted entrepreneur.  These cards are great for even the job seeker as they network to the first step in their careers. If you’re after the perfect present with a difference, then look no further than a MOO Gift Card.


Simply select a design and we’ll send the Gift Card to the lucky recipient via email – you can even schedule it for a future date. If you’d prefer to give your Gift Card in person, just send the Gift Concierge your details when the gift is funded and it’ll be emailed to you instead.


It’s quick (so perfect for those last minute panics) and can be used on anything – except another Gift Card, because that wouldn’t make any sense!


 


The perfect group gift to show that you care - and gives the recipient a leg up on making a lasting impression.
productList.productMetaDescription: The perfect group gift for a new graduate - whether itâ€™s graduating from school or taking a leap to another chapter in life. Give them a leg up on making a lasting impression.
